title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in a dynamic text item differs from the format displayed in a data/text item.
OB: No observed behavior is provided in the bug report.
EB: When inputting 'new Date()' as the content for three items, after saving and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the same date format.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for three items.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the page.
4. Observe the format of the datetime values in each item.
